Why did we create CDP?

"Because we know learning can be confusing, overwhelming, and expensive. Students need guidance, clarity, and encouragement—CDP is here to support you with free, trusted resources."

O2O.agency

“CDP, developed by O2O.agency, is a free learning platform that empowers students with the right skills and knowledge to thrive in today’s competitive landscape.”

3-Hour Workshop

AWS Workshop

Conquer the Cloud with Hands-On Tools

Start Date: 15-09-2025

AWS Workshop Details

Registration is Open!

Register for this Workshop

Your data will be used to facilitate communication and send certificates.

Hosted By

Pavan Kumar Reddy Lingam
4th Year, ECE - A Section

Organized By

O2O.agency

Workshop Description

Dive deep into the world of cloud computing with our comprehensive AWS Workshop. This 3-hour, hands-on session is designed for beginners and intermediates alike. You will learn the fundamentals of AWS services, including EC2, S3, and Lambda, and deploy your first cloud-based application. Our goal is to demystify the cloud and provide you with the practical skills needed to start building scalable and resilient solutions on the world's leading cloud platform.

Participant Benefits

  • Gain hands-on experience with core AWS services.
  • Understand cloud architecture best practices.
  • Deploy a real-world application to the cloud.
  • Receive a certificate of completion from O2O.agency.
  • Boost your resume with in-demand cloud skills.

Sample Certificate

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

Who is this workshop for?

This workshop is ideal for students, aspiring developers, and anyone interested in learning about cloud computing. No prior AWS experience is required.

Is this workshop free?

Yes, this workshop is completely free for all participants, aligning with CDP's mission to provide accessible education.

What do I need to bring?

Please bring your own laptop with a modern web browser. We will provide all necessary software access and guidance during the session.

Will I get a certificate?

Yes, all participants who complete the workshop will receive a digital certificate of completion from O2O.agency to showcase their new skills.
